description: Master category taxonomy for Whereness - comprehensive coverage of city services and experiences

tier1_essential.name: Essential Daily Services
tier1_essential.description: Core services residents and visitors need regularly

tier2_lifestyle.name: Lifestyle & Recreation
tier2_lifestyle.description: Activities and services that enhance quality of life

tier3_community.name: Community & Connection
tier3_community.description: Social, learning, and community engagement opportunities

discovery_strategy.goal: Find ALL coffee shops, not just highly-rated ones

coverage_patterns.description: Search by what people actually need

discovery_strategy.goal: Find ALL casual dining options, not just highly-rated ones
Find ALL fine dining establishments, not just celebrity chef restaurants
Find ALL ethnic restaurants, including family-owned and neighborhood spots

coverage_patterns.description: Search by cuisine and dietary needs

discovery_strategy.goal: Find ALL breweries and taprooms, including small local operations
Find ALL bars and drinking establishments, from dive bars to cocktail lounges
Find ALL bakeries and dessert shops, including small family operations
Find ALL grocery and food markets, including ethnic and specialty stores
Find ALL laundry and cleaning services, including small neighborhood operations
Find ALL auto services, including independent mechanics and specialty shops
Find ALL gas stations, including independent and branded stations

coverage_patterns.description: Search by fuel and service needs

discovery_strategy.goal: Find ALL parking options, including private lots and street parking areas
Find ALL banking and financial services, including credit unions and check cashing
Find ALL shipping and mail services, including independent pack/ship stores
Find ALL healthcare access points, including community clinics and specialists
Find ALL pharmacies, including independent and specialty pharmacies
Find ALL clothing stores, from thrift shops to boutiques to department stores
Find ALL home and hardware stores, including independent shops and specialty stores
Find ALL electronics and tech services, including independent repair shops
Find ALL books and media stores, including independent bookshops and specialty stores
Find ALL specialty retail stores, including niche hobby and craft shops
Find ALL fitness facilities, from budget gyms to specialty fitness studios
Find ALL yoga and meditation facilities, including home studios and community centers

search_strategies.primary_terms: Use main category search terms first
search_strategies.intent_modifiers: Add intent-based modifiers (e.g., 'family-friendly restaurant', 'work-friendly coffee shop')
search_strategies.neighborhood_search: Combine with neighborhood names for geographic coverage
search_strategies.chain_vs_local: Search for both chain names and 'local' modifiers
